parameters.query: SELECT r.*, t.text_path, t.vtt_path, t.srt_path, t.words_json_path, t.diarization_json_path, t.language_detected, t.speaker_count FROM transcriber.recordings r INNER JOIN transcriber.users u ON r.user_id = u.id LEFT JOIN transcriber.transcripts t ON r.id = t.recording_id WHERE u.email = $1 AND r.id = $2
